verses.roman:
'haridāsa' bali' prabhu ḍāke ghane ghana
dūre rahi' haridāsa kare nivedana

synonyms: haridāsa bali'-calling Haridāsa; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ḍāke—calls; ghane ghana—repeatedly; dūre rahi'—standing at a distance; haridāsa—Ṭhākura Haridāsa; kare nivedana—submitted.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was repeatedly calling, "Haridāsa, Haridāsa," and at that time Haridāsa, standing at a distance, spoke as follows.
